attributes.action: Ensure banks transfer money within 24 hours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As tax payers and therefore majority shareholders in Lloyds TSB /HBOS and northern rock. We wish the banks to ensure that all moneys moved by any form of electronic transfer are actioned and fully transfered to the recipients account within 24 hours from the transfer request. Further we wish the banks to ensure that all electronic transfers within the same banking group are actioned instantaneously.
